Text.Page:
I sent a scout to watch the Crag Stalker kulkari two days ago. No word since. I don't have more scouts, so I'm sending you.

Head out the west gate and find {@LinkCreature:221#1047#Hebbin}. If she's alive, get her report. If she's not, scout them out yourself and report back.

The captain was worried? Huh. Well, I just couldn't sneak away, is all.

Strangely, the kulkari aren't up to anything in particular. It's been oddly quiet.
